pullRequest.title: Corrected EyeOfEnderEntity mappings & comment
pullRequest.bodyText:
EyeOfEnderEntity has velocityX, velocityY and velocityZ properties in the mappings when these values are not velocities but the position to which the eye will fly to.
lifespan is also more appropriate instead of useCount as it's the number of ticks the entity has been alive for.
I'm still not sure about initTargetPos however it might be a bit better than moveTowards as the method itself doesn't actually do the moving.

commit.message:
Add some ProjectileEntity field names (#1507)

* Add some ProjectileEntity field names

* Fix my syntax mistakes

ServerWorld: add weather and time mappings (#1570) (#1572)

* ServerWorld: add weather and time mappings

* ServerWorldProperties: set time methods

nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -15,5 +15,12 @@ CLASS net/minecraft/class_1672 net/minecraft/entity/EyeOfEnderEntity
 	METHOD method_16934 (Lnet/minecraft/class_1799;)V
 		ARG 0 stack
 	METHOD method_16935 getTrackedItem ()Lnet/minecraft/class_1799;
-	METHOD method_7478 moveTowards (Lnet/minecraft/class_2338;)V
+	METHOD method_7478 initTargetPos (Lnet/minecraft/class_2338;)V
+		COMMENT Sets where the eye of ender will fly to.
+		COMMENT If within 12 horizontal blocks of the BlockPos, target is the block itself,
+		COMMENT     (Eye flying into the ground when close to the stronghold)
+		COMMENT otherwise, the target is 12 blocks in the horizontal direction of the BlockPos, and 8 blocks up.
+		COMMENT     (Eye flying up into the air)

nodes.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
            		COMMENT @param pos The block the eye of ender is drawn towards
          
          
            
            		COMMENT @param pos the block the eye of ender is drawn towards

commit.message:
Changed wording per suggestion
